data.text:
Will Patton is a podcaster and actor best known for his role as Colonel Dan Weaver on the TNT science fiction series Falling Skies.

Patton has appeared in the films Halloween Kills (2021), Halloween (2018), and Halloween Ends (2022). Similarly, he has appeared in podcasts such as Mister Impossible (2021), If It Bleeds (2020), Robicheaux (2018), and others.

Will Patton’s net worth is unknown. Will Patton’s net worth is estimated to be around $3 million as a performer. His net worth is a result of his high income, high earnings, savings, investments, and hard work.

Where was Will Patton born? Ethnicity, Nationality, Family, Education

Will Patton was born on June 14, 1954, in Charleston, South Carolina, under the sign of Gemini. The 67-year-old actor grew up on a farm and is of Caucasian race and American nationality. His father, Bill Patton, whose mother is unknown, and three siblings make up his family. Patton attended the North Carolina School of the Arts in Winston-Salem and the Actors’ Studio in New York City. He also served as a priest at Duke University.

How did Will Patton start his professional career?

Patton made his film debut in 1983 as Mark in Variety, Joe in Silkwood and Horst in After Hours in 1985. He portrayed Matthew Perry in the 1986 film Belizaire the Cajun. In 1997, he was nominated for Best Supporting Actor for his portrayal of General Bethlehem in the film The Postman.

He was eventually cast as Quentin Glass in the 2004 film The Punisher. His other feature films include A Mighty Heart, The List, Dog Days of Summer, American Violet, The Canyon, The Loss of a Teardrop Diamond, Knucklehead, Hammer, and The Forever Purge.

He most recently portrayed Garrett Randall in Season 3 of Yellowstone in 2020 and Avery Sunderland in Swamp Thing in 2019. Dillinger, Ryan’s Hope, Taking the Heat, The Last Ride, CSI: Crime Scene Investigation, and The Good Wife are among the television shows he has appeared in.
